truthDare.entry: Pick someone to tell the TRUTH!! (or Drink x2)
Pick someone to suffer the CONSEQUENCES!! (or Drink x2)
The person who gave you the device: DRINKS!
You dodge this one!! Hand the device to someone else!!
The person to your LEFT: DRINKS
The person to your RIGHT: DRINKS
The person to your LEFT: Tells the TRUTH (or Drink x2)
The person to your RIGHT: Tells the TRUTH (or Drink x2)
The person to your LEFT: suffer the CONSEQUENCES!! (or Drink x2)
The person to your RIGHT: suffer the CONSEQUENCES!! (or Drink x2)
